problem.markdown:
>>Didymo is currently causing problems in rivers all over the world. Recent studies suggest that it may be different from silver carp and the kudzu vine in that: << () Didymo has harmed native species to a much lesser extent () Didymo has harmed native species to a much greater extent () Didymo was introduced by humans (x) Didymo is not an invasive species () Didymo is a more current problem
[explanation]
Scientists have recently discovered fossilized forms of didymo in various countries across Europe, Asia, and North and South America, suggesting that didymo may not be an invasive species.
[explanation]
problem.p: Didymo is currently causing problems in rivers all over the world. Recent studies suggest that it may be different from silver carp and the kudzu vine in that:

choicegroup.label: Didymo is currently causing problems in rivers all over the world. Recent studies suggest that it may be different from silver carp and the kudzu vine in that:
choicegroup.choice: Didymo has harmed native species to a much lesser extent
Didymo has harmed native species to a much greater extent
Didymo is not an invasive species
Didymo is a more current problem

div.p: Scientists have recently discovered fossilized forms of didymo in various countries across Europe, Asia, and North and South America, suggesting that didymo may not be an invasive species.
